Necklace models own

item.title: The Woman in the Dark
item.dc:creator: stevenchu
item.description:
-the woman in the dark.- She was a young woman. A savior, Sufferer because life, even if not hers, was hard. She was a martyr. She was strong for more than just herself. […]

The post The Woman in the Dark appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
item.content:encoded:
-the woman in the dark.-

She was a young woman.

A savior,

Sufferer because life, even if not hers, was hard.

She was a martyr.

She was strong for more than just herself.

But she knew not yet why.

Photos by Steven Chu
Styling by Marc Sifuentes
Beauty by Ariel Vega
Maddie Welch @ Supreme

Buffer

The post The Woman in the Dark appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
